name: Space Abyss
description:
Space Abyss is an abstract game in which you play as a guardian and explore the Space Abyss planetary systems, freeing them from the usurpers.

Destroying space debris of the planetary system - you get various materials that will help you destroy usurpers more effectively. Materials are more convenient weapons for combat, more powerful weapons for obtaining materials, the health of the guardian, his ability to accelerate, and much more.

Be on your guard, the usurpers have captured these places and meeting with them will inevitably turn into a space battle. You must collect enough materials and free the planetary system from the usurpers in order to once again go to the liberation of the next planetary systems - this is the role of the guard.
